core.req

Class DataMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.req.Message
      • core.req.AckMessage
        • core.req.DataMessage

  • public class DataMessage
extends AckMessage
    This class is responsible for data packets that are treated as acknowledgments

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLOCK_SIZE
      Data block payload size.

      • Fields inherited from class core.req.AckMessage

        ACK_SIZE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataMessage(byte[] bytes)
      Constructs a data message using the given encoded bytes
      DataMessage(short block, byte[] data)
      Constructs a data message for the given block number which will contain the desired payload

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void decode(byte[] bytes)
      The method verifies the byte list is in a valid form for a data acknowledgement packet If verified, it stores the data in a private byte array
      byte[] getData()
      Returns a byte array of the data contained in the message
      boolean isLastBlock()
      Returns if this message is the last one in a transfer sequence
      byte[] toBytes()
      Writes the data to a byte stream and returns it
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the data contained in the message

        getBlock, setBlock

    • Field Detail

      • BLOCK_SIZE

        public static final int BLOCK_SIZE
        Data block payload size. All datagram packet will contain this block size worth of bytes (not including the header bytes)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataMessage

        public DataMessage(byte[] bytes)
            throws InvalidMessageException
        Constructs a data message using the given encoded bytes
        Parameters:
        bytes - - Array of byte data to decode
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageException - - If the bytes do no produce a valid Data Message

      • DataMessage

        public DataMessage(short block,
                   byte[] data)
        Constructs a data message for the given block number which will contain the desired payload
        Parameters:
        block - - Index of this data block in a transfer sequence
        data - - Payload of data to transfer

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        protected void decode(byte[] bytes)
               throws InvalidMessageException
        The method verifies the byte list is in a valid form for a data acknowledgement packet If verified, it stores the data in a private byte array
        Overrides:
        decode in class AckMessage
        Parameters:
        bytes - - A byte list to decode
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageException - - If the given bytes do not produce a valid data message

      • toBytes

        public byte[] toBytes()
        Writes the data to a byte stream and returns it
        Overrides:
        toBytes in class AckMessage
        Returns:
        An encoded version of this data message

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the data contained in the message

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Returns a byte array of the data contained in the message
        Returns:
        Payload of this message

      • isLastBlock

        public boolean isLastBlock()
        Returns if this message is the last one in a transfer sequence
        Returns:
        If block is last in sequence
